TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Sapat, title = Sapat, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sapat} }

S.FORM: sapat mha ni sqliqun ta' 'laqi' kneril lga, mutu ta' msina' pira' bzyok galan ta' sapat.
sapat mha ni sqliqon ta' 'laqi' kneril lga, moto ta' msina' pira' bzyok galan ta' sapat.
